Name: Black Island
About the game: Black Island is a classic adventure game with cinematic storytelling. Gather items, solve puzzles and throw yourself into the darkest of mysteries. If you are a lover of adventure games - Black Island is for you! A man finds himself on a mysterious island with a splitting headache and no memories. Last night’s drinking got out of hand – again, or at least that’s what he thinks has happened. But as the day goes on the harsh truth starts to dawn on him. Black Island is a story of a man and his struggle of survival. It is a story of what happens when man tries to play god. There’s nothing scarier than a man who is driven by his possessive belief in utopia. Features: - Classic point and click adventure game with a strong story - Several puzzles to solve - Four videos which unfold the story - A trilling atmosphere of mystery and nightmares - Beautiful graphics and real life situations - Voice over, sound and music which create a surreal and mysterious soundscape
